summary: REQ-12 is largely implemented: a new OurLittleComparisonSection component is created, integrated into App.tsx, has a soft rounded frame, subtle shadow, hover zoom animation, and the poetic caption. However, the image source used in the component points to '/assets/generated/comparison.dim_930x1240.jpg' rather than '/assets/comparison.jpg' as required by the acceptance criteria. The static asset file itself (frontend/public/assets/comparison.jpg) does not appear in the diff as an added file, so it may not have been committed.

missing_requirements.requirement: The uploaded arms photo (pic.jpeg) is saved as frontend/public/assets/comparison.jpg and committed as a static asset.
missing_requirements.reason: No file named 'comparison.jpg' at 'frontend/public/assets/comparison.jpg' appears in the added files list. The diff shows only one added file: OurLittleComparisonSection.tsx. The image referenced in the component is '/assets/generated/comparison.dim_930x1240.jpg', not '/assets/comparison.jpg'.

hallucinated_features.description: The image is sourced from '/assets/generated/comparison.dim_930x1240.jpg' — a generated/processed variant path — rather than the specified '/assets/comparison.jpg'.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies saving the image at 'frontend/public/assets/comparison.jpg' and rendering it from that path. Using a 'generated' subdirectory with a dimension-suffixed filename was not requested.
